channel.title: My Java Control panel for clients/servers
channel.description: Hi well im making a java control panel for clients so they can be updated and compiled and etc but im used to using Visual Basic so i was wondering Right i have a button on the java app/form right when the users clicks the button i want it to run another app(EXE, BAT) file does anyone know how i can do this?
